aparade kiyanna baha hugak aya me wade niyameta kala.eeth ithin samahara ayata mamama mathak kalama thamayi mathak wenne.aa eeka kiyana kota mata thawa kathawak mathak una..mage thawa ledak thibuna issara..issara kiwuwe mama gataya sandiye..mokak..?ee kiyanne mama dan pahilada...?naha..naha me kiyanne mata ithin oya dasayayi masayayi kale wage..ow ow ithin mage walantayin samaya..ee kale thama.ithin ee dawaswala mama oya man yalu wela hiti ganu dariwiyan lagata giyahama samahara welawata kiyanna hithagena giya dewal amathaka wena welawal thiyenawane...?samaharu dakkama nan ithin un hiti thanuth amathaka wena welawal hitan thibuna..ha ..ha eewa ona naha methanata..ithin ehema amathaka una welawata mama eyalagenma ahanawa "mama mokakda oyata kiyanna aawe kiyala.."ithin eyala kiyanawa"m.m..arakada..?""naha ane...""ehenam arakada..?""naha naha eekath neweyi.."onna oya widiyata paya ganak giyahama thamayi kiyanna aawa de mathak wenne..samahara welawata mathak wennema naha.habayi ithin kale gewenawa danneth naha.mama oya thiyariyama pahu kaleka hithamathama bhawitha karannath purudu una.ee kiwuwe hithamuko ganu lamayek ekka katha karanna melo mathrukawak naha kiyala...ithin mama ehema wela mage katha pettiya wahigena ena welawata mehema kiyanawa..."eeka neweyi mama oyata monawada kiyanna hitiye..?"anna ethakota eya patan gannawa kiyanna.."arakada..?""mekada..?"mata thiyenne "naha naha eekath neweyi..""eekath neweyi..ane hondata mathak karannako.."kiyala witharayi.harima sarala deyak..dan ithin mewa igenagena ape anith kolu set ekath me widiyata lawu karanna patan ganida danne naha..on mama ehema na oowata...samaharu kiyayi aadaraya karaddi koyitharan dewal thiyenawada kiyala katha karanna.karapu ayama thamayi danne..?mokada samahara lawu idiriyata adila yanakota lawu eka nikan ilawu wage therena kalayak aawoth ee kiyanne dennata denna hithapu tharan galapenne naha kiyala therunu kalayak aawoth..ee wage welawata dala yannath baha..hitha riddannath baha.ehemayi kiyala wade ada gena yannath baha.ara unu hinda bonnath bari..kiri hinda wisi karannath bari lewal ekata aawama..mokada karanne..wade nikan ohe adagena yannane wenne...ehema unama wiruddha parshawayen eeka therun gannakalma api iwasanna epayi.ithin ehema dennata denna galapenne nahayi kiyala dennama therun gaththama dawasak enawa.."meka hariyanne naha neda..?
